content: this if it is off by a lot it can adversely effect the fit of the hat but if it is close to correct the fit should be fine page 1 of 3 body of hat switch to #7 16-inch circular needle row 13 - *p1 k3 k2tog* repeat from * to * and to 4 row cable stitch pattern and work evenly across row until 4 ½ 5 5 ½ inches from beginning or 3 row 14 - *p1 k2 k2tog* repeat from * to * inches less than desired length measured from across row crown of head down to ear end having just row 15 - *p1 rfc across next 3 sts* repeat from completed a row 3 of 4 row cable stitch pattern * to * across row row 16 - *p1 k1 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row decreases decreases are worked in the 4 row row 17 - *p1 k2tog* repeat from * to * across cable stitch pattern continue in pattern as written row below switching to double pointed us 7 needles row 18 - *k2tog* repeat from * to * across row when necessary 7 8 9 sts remain row 1 * work 10 sts in pattern as established cut yarn and run end through remaining stitches k2tog * repeat from * to * across row pull tight run end inside and secure weave in row 2 - * p1 k3 p1 k3 p1 k2* repeat from * to ends * across row row 3 - * p1 k3 p1 k3 p1 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row row 4 - *p1 rfc over next 3 sts p1 rfc over next 3 sts p1 k1* repeat from * to * across row row 5 - *p1 k3 p1 k3 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row row 6 - *p1 k3 p1 k4* repeat from * to * across row row 7 - *p1 k3 p1 k2 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row row 8 - *p1 rfc over next 3 sts * repeat from * to * across row row 9 - *p1 k3 p1 k1 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row row 10 - *p1 k3 p1 k2* repeat from * to * across row row 11 - *p1 k3 p1 k2tog* repeat from * to * across row row 12 *p1 rfc across next 3 sts p1 k1* repeat from * to * across row page 2 of 3 photo tutorial of rfc numbers correspond to numbers on text explanation on the first page of this pattern 1 1a 2 3 4 pattern photographs and tutorial © 2008-2019 nina machlin dayton please don t reproduce this pattern except for personal use without permission this pattern is for non-commercial use only please contact the designer at artistsdaughter@gmail com with any questions page 3 of 3
